title: Governance #3: Logo vote
body:
PROPOSAL SUMMARY: After much deliberation, we have narrowed the list of choices down to 5 designs, that you can see on our Medium article.

SEE THE 5 LOGOS HERE: https://medium.com/waultfinance/governance-3-logo-vote-now-open-a6931c1c038c

LOGO #1: The fragmented nature into one represents the previous ecosystem and its evolutionary merge into a unified platform.

LOGO #2: The revealed construction grid of the letter T represents the many steps it has taken for us to reach this turning point for the platform.

LOGO #3: The ticker symbol $THO is hidden within the coin design (the letters are nested), representing the multifaceted approach this new platform is taking. It also provides a recognizable geometric design.

LOGO #4: The dynamic rings represent the previous three tokens merging into one unified Thorus.

LOGO #5: The split halves of the orb represent the peaks and valleys we as a community have experienced and have come out stronger for. The center also depicts the letter T.

QUESTION: What logo are you voting for?
author: 0x25932EfC092400f7bc62ecbb2C3EAB67F9e8bA55
